website_summaries.verdict: A totally ingenious idea that many wish they could've used when their kids were young.
pros: Gives you the accuracy of an oral temperature reading without the battle to keep a standard thermometer in the mouth
Protective cover included for clean storage or travel
Includes memory feature to help monitor progress and trends
cons: Needs to stay in mouth up to 2 min

customer_reviews.title: Battery is NOT replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: So this arrived today and I haven’t had to use it yet but the first thing I read in the directions was that the battery is NOT replaceable. Basically, after the battery dies, you throw it away. Had I know that, I would not have purchased it. Otherwise, the design and idea of the thermometer is simple enough. Turn it on and put it in babies mouth. And eventually throw it away. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the product and it says low battery, I read the instructions and it says that when you see the low battery sign to discard the product. I feel robbed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool but too many reasons I wish I didnt buy :(
customer_reviews.text: Overall I write the product a 1 star for many reasons..its a cool concept but here are the negatives.. -extremely slow reading...which would be fine but if your baby is fussy or just doesn't want it then it makes it very difficult shoving something in your child's mouth when they dont want it. -if your baby doesn't want it you feel like you're choking them -arrived and was low battery like many said which is my fault for ignoring -no way to change battery that I can tell anyway -not very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: So Impractical
customer_reviews.text: Your baby is probably being fussy which is why you need to check it’s temperature- but this thermometer needs to be in baby’s mouth for a solid 5min before it gets an accurate read. What fussy baby is going to keep a thermometer, even a paci one, in their mouth that long?! Nope, he or she will cry or spit it out, your read will be totally inaccurate, and you will be wanting to scream in frustration. Great idea, terrible in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Jael Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Not as described/pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: Crap chinese knock off version. Don't bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMom

customer_reviews.title: Nicci
customer_reviews.text: This takes way to long to read a temp!!! After sitting here for almost 2 min then it only read 96.6 and wasn't accurate! At least this was only$10 because the refund process is difficult as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Phillips

customer_reviews.title: ZERO stars
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT- save your hard-earned money and find another product. This worthless thing reads a fever as 92 F, which is dangerously misleading. Nothing to do with latching, I tried it myself. They will not accept returns- advised to call a help line with 9-6 hours because everyone wants to lose their lunch hour pleading to get their money back for a MISLEADING product for babies. This company should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Dies quickly and takes forever
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for the few times that it worked, which was about half a dozen times in 5 months. It’s hard to get a baby to stay happy with this binkie when it takes so long to take the reading.
customer_reviews.author: Music and Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for an infant? But 90 seconds is ridiculous...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally because my cousin had it on her baby list. The idea is genius... But the ability is substandard. I tried to use it for my 11 month old, and it did not work for him. The idea of making him keep his mouth shut for 90 seconds or more is not easy. Even my toddler who loves sucking on a nuk still didn't keep it in long enough to register a temperature. This may work for a newborn... But not for older infants and toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE ITEM. RETURNS NOT ACCEPTED.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. Takes an extremely long time to take a temp, and I keep getting a temperature of 90-92 degrees. WAY off. To make matters worse, the seller doesn't take returns (which you don't find out unless you try to return it), so I've had it only a few hours and I'm out my money but stuck with this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: LazySunday

customer_reviews.title: No bad, but you will no use as often as ...
customer_reviews.text: No bad, but you will no use as often as you think you will, better buy a actual thermometer, if you have a infant have the temporal duo with ear reading, these one won't work if your baby do not get the pacifier, if the baby is crying and fuzzy, is hard to keep it time enough to an accurate reading, and may be affected if you feed the baby prior use. The quality of the product was good, durable.
customer_reviews.author: marcos g. vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Needs to stay in mouth to long to register temp.
customer_reviews.text: I like the thought of this product however they have to have this passie in thier mouth for a little while for it to register thier temp. If your baby has a temp or is fussy she will not keep it long enough to work. It's a really good thought but didn't work for us
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Uting

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use "err" on screen.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a single use before breaking. Now each time I try to use it it simply reads "err" Upon scouring the instructions all I could find was a footnote stating this was a "system malfunction" I hardly can say it was worth the 13 bucks I paid for it for a single use. I wish the product worked. I thought it was a great way to make taking her temperature seem a positive thing for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: kitaroknine

customer_reviews.title: Buy this before you need it
customer_reviews.text: Babies get sick very fast and go from bad to worse quickly. You need to have this on hand and not wait for them to have a cold, ear infection or something you don't know what it is. If they show signs of illness, monitor their temperature. Call the doctor if it is going higher. Babies can become critically ill within minutes. A temperature baseline can ease your worries or alert you to move fast to the emergency room or the telephone.
customer_reviews.author: BottleTree Farm

customer_reviews.title: nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: My pregnant daughter tested. Took five minutes but then she didnt have a fever so maybe it might work quicker with the fevers I would assume. Worked well, just took longer than expected but for the money its well worth it. I would use this for slight fevers or fevers you not sure are really present. I would probably not chance it for a high fever unless it was an only option.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Marie

customer_reviews.title: takes 3-4 minutes to get a reading
customer_reviews.text: Takes way to long to get a reading. We never could get it to work on our twin 6 month olds. They never sucked on it without a pause in order for it to get a reading. Plus instructions state that it auto turns off in 3-4 minutes?? So sounds like even if we got a reading you better look at it immediately before it shuts off and you have no idea what their temperature was. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick checks of temperature
customer_reviews.text: If your little one hate thermometers or weird things in their mouth, this is for you. It does take a second to read, so if your baby pops out pacifiers easily you might have to help hold it in for a moment. But the reasons are fairly accurate, of course this is not exactly where pediatricians say to take baby Temps but it will do in a pinch and if you just want to check quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: My infant loves pacifiers however wants nothing to do with this so we’ve never been able to use it! I’ve tried several times over many months and loved that it was small and could throw it in my diaper bag! Ultimately he wouldn’t suck on it bc it is too hard , and I could never get a read from it. I moved to the forehead thermometer and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Powell

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Sucka sucks sucks... I got this thing thinking “wonderful something easy to use”. That was not the case.. baby has to suck the thing forever to get a temp which is awful if your kids doesn’t take a pacifier. Used it about 4 times and now it just simply reads error, tries to do a return via amazon and it says I must call the manufacturer. Unreal. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not for teething or overnight use
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to but a few things.... of your child is teething you would’nt want to use this bc they will want to bite it and it has an electrode inside the nipple. Secondly I assumed you could use this easily while child is sleeping to check temp. The buttons are small and it makes it very difficult to use while they are sleeping . However for during the day use for non-teething children I’m sure this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Knowlden

customer_reviews.title: Not reccomend by mother of 2.
customer_reviews.text: Did like the idea however using it realized that it has to stay in babies mouth for 3-5 minutes to give an accurate read.. if baby spits it out you have to start over... no way? And you cant boil it or sanitize it really? So if your baby is sick and sucks on it you are potentially putting those same germs in thier mouth next time??? No thanks. There are so many easier faster and better options. Sorry not sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of it?
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is the BEST! Parents, you know the struggle of wrestling with our infant/toddler and trying to jam a stick in their throat to tell you if they have a fever. I want to kick myself for not having thought of this handy little gadget. You just press the power button, shove it in the kid's mouth and within a minute, you have the child's temerature and the child is just happily sucking away. It even lights up so you can easily read the temp at night without disrupting your babie's sleep. SO AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor results
customer_reviews.text: While the idea is great for a calm, healthy baby, a crying baby will not latch onto it therefore not allowing it to get a proper reading. The nipple is uncomfortable for our son so he doesn't like it. This makes the minimum 3 minute wait time difficult to achieve especially when as a parent you go into panic mode. Also, the button needs to be pressed hard which isn't ideal.
customer_reviews.author: EOD T.K.

customer_reviews.title: must have one definetly  great accurate and cheap
customer_reviews.text: even if you own expensive models sometime all not accurate or good to compare to get rid of suspicious result absolutely worth cost for us result was same as those expensive infrared one baby like it as a usual pacifier but i didn't give him for long time because of maybe not quiet great idea
customer_reviews.author: Can&Mom

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This is a second time purchase for our family. I had one when my son was a baby, he’s now almost 7. We passed the first one down to a family member. When I found out I was expecting my daughter, this was on my must have list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sometimes 3-5 minutes and if my son doesnt feel good he sometimes wont suck on it that
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time to get a read off, sometimes 3-5 minutes and if my son doesnt feel good he sometimes wont suck on it that long
customer_reviews.author: Noneyabiz

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had thought of it!
customer_reviews.text: When I came across this item I couldn’t believe I had never seen one! Such an ingenious idea and for having worked in an infant room at a daycare for almost 10 years I’m kind of upset I didn’t think of it first lol! Anyway, gifted to my brother and sister-in-law who are expecting and they also agree it’s a great idea. Hopefully it works great and for the price it’s wirth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Grose

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect it starts off saying LO before putting it in my sons mouth so the other comments saying it’s broke because it says LO are dummy’s ! I wouldn’t recommend this if your baby does normally use them because they do have to keep in there mouth a minute or so but definitely glad I got it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Sierrah Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Really nifty idea for a thermometer. Obly problem i sometimes have is that when my baby is actually sick,sge cries, and when she cries the readings are always way off. But when i pop it in her mouth when shes sleep, its great. I love how it lights up at night to show the readings and different color to show if her temp is too high. I do wish it had a loop handle so i could attatch it to a pacifier strap so i wouldn't easly lose it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Works well for if you don’t want to do a rectal temperature. Reads pretty quick but when my son isn’t feeling well that doesn’t matter because all he wants is his pacifier anyway. Stays lit for a long time so you can make sure you read the temp ok. Does beep as well when done taking temperature
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty unhappy with this. The highest temp it shows for me, a normal healthy adult with the patience to hold it in my mouth for several minutes, is 93.5. Oftentimes it shuts off before any reading. I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but SLOW
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer is accurate and convenient, it just takes a while to read (a few minutes, which is FOREVER is sick baby world). And if fussy sick baby spits it out, you baber to start all over again. Any convenience is outweighed by the time it takes to actually GET an accurate reading
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead before we even got to use it
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. I bought this to hopefully be able to take my newborn temp. My baby finally arrives I open the package and the battery is already dead. WE DIDN'T EVEN USE IT! Now I need to spend more money to get a thermometer that works.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: If your baby doesn't care for pacifiers like mine doesn't put a tiny bit of something sweet ...
customer_reviews.text: This weekend fantastically! Pro tip: If your baby doesn't care for pacifiers like mine doesn't put a tiny bit of something sweet on it to get them interested. I used molasses because it helps with constipation, and I have got one constipated little boy. Be aware that using honey can be dangerous because of the potential for Botulism with certain types of honey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stacey Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this would be great if my daughter would actually hold it in her ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this would be great if my daughter would actually hold it in her mouth long enough for it to take her temperature. She has one pacifier that she is attached to and she is having no parts of this even if it is just for a minute.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya B.

customer_reviews.title: Received non-working product
customer_reviews.text: Received this thermometer and it was already displaying a "low battery" warning upon being turned on. After reading the instructions, it turns out the battery is NOT replaceable and the directions indicate that it should be thrown out. Also not able to get through on the "customer service" line to get a return/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Works but Slow
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, it's too hard to get a temperature if baby spits it out. The pacifier must be in the mouth for a few minutes in order for it to read. The only plus is that its comfortable for a baby and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This takes 2-3 minutes to produce a temp. We tried getting an accurate temperature reading from multiple people and could not. We bought this for our 8 month old. After multiple attempts we could never get it to produce a temperature. It would always read low. We assumed we were doing something wrong so me and my wife both tried to take our own temperature. After holding this in our mouth for 3 min we both got 94 degrees. I tried to return and it does not allow returns. They know this product is junk.
customer_reviews.author: zach johnson

customer_reviews.title: Temp. read way too low - not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This takes too long to read the temperature, my daughter wouldn't keep it in her mouth long enough. When we finally did get a reading it was way 92.8 degrees F. So, I tried it on myself and it was 91.3, then my husband tried it and it was still low. Either we got a defective one or this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is such a waste of money. There is no way any child is going to suck something that heavy, for as long as they need it to read. We tried it (adults) and it took forever. And it was no where near accurate. On top of that, it’s only good until the battery dies, then you have to throw it away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: 5 minutes to work
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Takes 5 minutes for the tempature to read. Hard to get a infant/child to suck on this for 5 minutes let alone a sick child. Do not recommend. Really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Low Battery
customer_reviews.text: First time we turned it on, it says that the battery is "LO". This is not a replaceable battery. You're supposed to discard once it goes dead. They should not be selling these if the shelf life is that "lo".
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Consider nipple style if child is picky
customer_reviews.text: Son caught on bc it was different then normal pacifiers (was very picky about them, understandable lol (nuk only) But did it’s job, easier to fool while sleeping if your child is picky as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY, WASTE OF MONEY/TIME
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t work, future more Amazon is not helping on the return/refund. Telling me to contact the manufacturer, the reason I have prime is so I can easily return items that do not work. However this is the 3rd item in 2 months I’m not satisfied with. If this does not get resolved to my satisfaction I will be ending my prime.
customer_reviews.author: janelle west

customer_reviews.title: i little sad the package was a bit opened on the side
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet did turn it on made sure it worked... i little sad the package was a bit opened on the side, it was miner but its a baby product so it worried me a bit... will be rising it b4 use and i will use it on myself b4 anything .. baby will be preemie cant risk him catching anything from open products... great price, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: keyla ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have the green and red light for easier use
customer_reviews.text: It save my bacon when using it in the night, te only problem is that it must be in the mouth of your baby all the time that's taking the measurements because otherwise it won't be accurate...
customer_reviews.author: jorge andres talamantes martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not ideal to use if baby's nose is stopped up.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it was accurate, easy to read and easy to use....although when my daughter had a stuffy nose and couldn't breathe well through her nose, it was impossible to keep the thermometer in and her mouth closed long enough to check temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product itself appears to be ideal when using for an infant but it’s only ideal if it works. Since we removed it out of the packaging it’s been on low battery mode. I wish it worked for longer than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: mmct

customer_reviews.title: Theory is good!
customer_reviews.text: Theory is good. Product design is decent. Would be very handy! However, it takes too long to read a temperature. It’s a few minutes. If it took a temperature in 20-30 seconds, it’s be great! But it doesn’t. For me, it’s quicker and easier to just use a regular ole thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: KRYAN0341

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate, better to get a traditional or infrared thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: This works... that’s to say, it functions. The only things I’ve noticed is that the temperature it records is sometimes off by 7-10 degrees. It’s also difficult sometimes because it takes a long time to read the temp and when you need to use it, it’s likely that your kiddo is crying and won’t keep it in their mouth long enough to get a read.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT BATTERY WAS WORN OUT
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT WAS IN LOW BATERY MODE, I COULDNT EVEN USE IT. I FEEL FRUSTRATED BY THE PRODUCT SINCE IT HAS ALREADY BEING WORN OUT WHEN I RECEIVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never actually gotten a true reading as it takes FOREVER to read. My baby LOVES pacifiers, so I figured it would be ok. But even he’s not patient enough for this thing. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee this product! Sometime is not the easiest to get your baby to use - but when my baby does use it, it’s just nice to have a second opinion on temperature! I also just use a normal thermometer- but this is also in the diaper bag at all times and is super handy! I would highly suggest for new moms!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: worst thermometer ever
customer_reviews.text: and this is for a baby? i don't even know how you're even supposed to get the huge bulbuous head into the poor kids mouth. i pourchased it for myself during the pandemic because it was the only one available. it kept slipping out of my mouth... but once i was able to get it to stay long enough to get a temperature the back light went out and you couldn't read it. I don't know, maybe it would work better rectally, but i'm not trying it!
customer_reviews.author: scott spencer

customer_reviews.title: Dead Battery and Won't Accept Return
customer_reviews.text: We open this item just to find a dead battery. Tried processing a return because is a "Prime" item and is not eligible for return??? So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead battery 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dead battery and since you can’t replace the battery, the thermometer is useless to me. Very upsetting, needed a working thermometer during these times.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: broke after one week
customer_reviews.text: This broke after one week of use. The display just says "err" now. Also, it's not waterproof, which means you can't wash the whole thing, which is a deal breaker. I washed it once, and was careful not to get the front side wet, it stopped working a couple days later. I don't know if that related. Battery is not replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Babies dont like rectal thermometers. Can u blame them? Lol only thing is it took long to finish reading. Baby was getting jumpy i had to hold it to her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this product, but it is not accurate at all. I decided to test it on myself before my child, and its saying my temperature is 95°. If I use a normal thermometer, it reads 98.5. Tried it on my child, and same thing. I would have returned it, if I didn’t wait so long to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Battery was bunk before 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package for the first time to use with newborn to find the battery low and not usable. Such a disappointment. Oh...and the battery is not replaceable per the instructions in the manual. I will be contacting the mfg’r.
customer_reviews.author: Isagirl

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with Lo battery. I tried using this thermometer for the first time and it said Lo (battery level). Retired for a temperature and neither of them would turn on. Also, they taste HORRIBLY of plastic. Went to return the item and it says I have to contact the seller directly. I use Amazon for a reason, so I don't have to do that. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE C

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, just slow
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this is one pacifier that my toddler doesn't want to keep in her mouth for love or money, so the fact that it takes what feels like forever to finish taking a temp reading is frustrating. I guess that is more of a toddler problem then a functional problem, but if they can develop one that takes the reading faster that would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: May take a little too long
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea as long as you know baby will keep it in their mouth. Sometimes I feel like it takes a little too long. Had a couple times my son would spit it out before it was done.
customer_reviews.author: taylor lovett

customer_reviews.title: Only good for young babies - not older
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes FOREVER. And if you’re little babe takes a binky that isn’t this shape & is old enough to take it out - she won’t keep it in. It’s bulky so they are interested in looking at it vs sucking on it. If I had to do it again, I wouldn’t buy this. This is best for super young babies.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I like how I can take my baby’s temp without all the fuss
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and user friendly—GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well, much more sturdy and durable than I have imagined it would be (especially given the price point)
customer_reviews.author: Our Mutual Friend

customer_reviews.title: A great concept but needs to stay in the baby's mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: A great concept but needs to stay in the baby's mouth for 3 minutes for it to get an accurate reading - that in itself is a task. You're probably better off getting forehead strips.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Baumwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, great if worked
customer_reviews.text: I got mine opened and waited for my 10 wk old to check. Never turned on, never tried it nothing. Well in my baby woke went to try. Won't power on. Don't know if battery or if the whole things defective or it's just dead.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy doesn't give a reading
customer_reviews.text: The product didnt work at all. Tried several times. Only goes up to 92.0 degrees. Baby had a fever and this was useless.
customer_reviews.author: katlynn20

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate, slow
customer_reviews.text: While this is an excellent idea, the thermometer takes forever to get a reading, and it's never accurate. I tried with both my newborn and toddler with poor results. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anmlvr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a baby shower gift or for the mom who can't get their little one to sit still... Great for newborns! Love this thing!❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Lisa jean Harding

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my future niece
customer_reviews.text: My sister likes it. I bought it for my sister since she is having a baby. My niece may enjoy it, the fact it tells their temperature will ensure that the baby won't have a fever and if she does they will know.
customer_reviews.author: InuboyNetwork

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea. Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Smart idea but takes forever. I ordered 2 as a backup since I read you basically havr to throw it away once the battery dies... but it's pointless. I gave the other away at a baby shower. I'd only order it if your kid demands a pacifier. Then I could see it being useful.
customer_reviews.author: Nyros

customer_reviews.title: Batteries gave out/ Not easy to change out battery
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses (like about 5x in a 4 month period) battery started to give out. Followed its instructions about immediately turning off after each use to conserve battery but still gave out. Attempted to change batteries but it was a fail. Ended up breaking it. No easy way to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: You will not be needing this one at all.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but it is not really convenient. Go for an instant infrared thermometer instead and your life will be much better
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Is good but maybe need some change
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, well design, etc. My concern is the fact it take to long for read the temperature more than 1 min, which is in my opinion very long. Maybe when the baby is like in the beginning of a fever is good, but when baby is uncomfortable not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G

customer_reviews.title: Bought for baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: She liked and it was on her want list. It says it's easy to use and it looks easy to read!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Takes to long together a reading my baby would often spit it out before we got a reading.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Burt

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should of looked more into this product before ordering but when my child doesn’t feel well waiting a minute and a half for the pacifier to give me a reading feels like forever. There are so many instant thermometers on the market. This product does work, as long as your child keeps the binkie in their mouth, but not convienent
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: My newborn was feeling warm. And instantly adapted to sucking this once inserted in his mouth had no issues getting a reading.
customer_reviews.author: Hiz heart

customer_reviews.title: A Waste
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Purchased through Prime, but surprisingly, the item is not eligible for return or refund. Wasted time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: stop, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money. Doesn't work. Received a replacement, still a janky product.
customer_reviews.author: Jode

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and the battery was dead sent it back for a new one and the replacement was also the same way there was no option to return or try again so I had to keep the replacement and never got to use it
customer_reviews.author: Asevia

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: Too big for an infant.. they arnt use to a pacifier so early in life that they gag on it. Way too big!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is just a waste of
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to keep in my daughters mouth. I would defintely only order this if your child is inclined to using pacifier's. Otherwise it is just a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: BFab28

customer_reviews.title: Great for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must for new moms. So much easier and safer than the rectal or ear thermometers. As a new mom I'm constantly checking every time baby feels a little warm and its so easy to just put pacifier in his mouth and see it flashing green.
customer_reviews.author: A. Volberding

customer_reviews.title: First time mom trap
customer_reviews.text: Not overly accurate since the proble doesn’t get back far enough. Takes too long to read and it’s heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t got to use this item yet, but it’s definitely what was pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Had 3 baby showers and got each one of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Had 3 baby showers and got each one of these!!! Hope they work well but really hope they don't need them much!!
customer_reviews.author: sussie458

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time for a reading. Most thermometers will produce a reading in a minute or less. Besides that it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: TKH

customer_reviews.title: Not useful at all
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work even if I put it in my mouth! It would not read any temp. Useless, baby wouldn't take it in longer than 10 sec and that's not enough time.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: its nice IF your baby will actually suck on it
customer_reviews.text: its nice IF your baby will actually suck on it. Will not read temperature just sitting in the mouth like a regular thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wachtmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but bad in reality
customer_reviews.text: It takes something like 2.5 minutes to read temp -- way too long! -- and our infant constantly pushes it out of her mouth or acts like she's choking on it. It may work better when she's older and has a bigger mouth but at 1 month old it's not a good way to take her temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. JonesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Battery died so quickly
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 10-15 uses and the battery died. Works in a pinch, but it’s basically disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems convenient, however it takes forever to take the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole2

customer_reviews.title: Great first add thing to have for baby
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this but the one thing it doesn’t tell u is that it has to stay in babies mouth for about a min before it works if they use a passifier then this would be perfect for your baby
customer_reviews.author: cbertram845

customer_reviews.title: Reads temperature quickly
customer_reviews.text: Being a first time mom I was extremely paranoid about purchasing the “right” thermometer. This 1 is great. It reads quickly and isn’t harmful to the baby. I love how it comes with a cover too
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Lake

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: as long as your baby likes these kinds of pacifiers, it’ll work
customer_reviews.author: Sara white

customer_reviews.title: Your infant has to suck on it for several minutes before it will tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to reach temp. Your infant has to suck on it for several minutes before it will tell you the temp. A regular thermometer works better.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great idea to take a babies temperature
customer_reviews.text: Great idea to take a babies temperature. As a brand-new grandmother I had it sent to my daughter among quite a few other things and she seems to like it. We just hope we don't have to use it very often
customer_reviews.author: yorkilvr forever

product_meta.title: Summer Pacifier Thermometer, Teal/White
product_meta.description:
Provide soothing comfort while taking baby’s temperature. The Pacifier Thermometer’s convenient Fever Alert glow feature allows parents to get a nighttime temperature reading without disturbing baby. A protective cover is included for travel and clean storage.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Fever Alert glow feature indicates fever and beeps when readings are complete
Memory feature recalls last reading to help monitor child’s progress
Protective cover included for clean storage or travel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,487 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
